name: Marketplace Seller Agent
description: AI agent that lists products, negotiates with buyers, and manages sales on the Hedera marketplace. Handles inventory management, dynamic pricing, order fulfillment, and secure escrow-based transactions.

bearer.description: JWT token for seller agent authentication

skills.name: Product Listing
skills.description: List and manage products on the marketplace. Register products with ERC-8004 for discoverability, set prices, manage inventory, and update product information.

examples.input: List new product: Laptop, price: 500 HBAR
examples.output: Returns product ID and ERC-8004 registration confirmation

skills.name: Price Negotiation
skills.description: Autonomously negotiate prices with buyer agents using A2A protocol. Uses dynamic pricing strategies based on inventory levels, market demand, and profit margins.

examples.input: Negotiate with buyer for product ID 12345
examples.output: Returns negotiation result with final agreed price

skills.name: Payment Acceptance
skills.description: Accept payments via escrow contracts and x402 protocol. Monitors escrow funding, verifies payment amounts, and tracks transaction status on Hedera testnet.

examples.output: Returns escrow address and payment confirmation

skills.name: Shipment Confirmation
skills.description: Confirm shipment of sold items and update escrow status. Records shipment details on-chain and notifies buyer agent via A2A protocol.

examples.input: Confirm shipment for order ID 67890, tracking: ABC123

skills.name: Inventory Management
skills.description: Manage product inventory levels, track stock, and update availability. Automatically adjusts pricing based on inventory levels and demand.

examples.input: Update inventory for product ID 12345, quantity: 50

skills.name: Sales Tracking
skills.description: Track sales performance, revenue, and order status. Monitors escrow contracts, completed transactions, and provides analytics on sales trends.

examples.input: Get sales report for last 30 days
examples.output: Returns sales analytics with revenue and order counts

skills.name: Dispute Resolution
skills.description: Handle buyer disputes and refund requests. Manages escrow refund process, provides evidence for disputes, and coordinates with buyer agents.

skills.name: Instant Payment Processing
skills.description: Process instant HBAR payments via x402 protocol for immediate transactions. Supports both escrow-based and direct payment methods.

examples.input: Process instant payment of 100 HBAR for product ID 12345
examples.output: Returns payment transaction hash and confirmation
